# Portfolio Tools

This week's learning diary is to produce a Xarigan presentation and host it on a Quarto website. The content of the presentation includes 9 slides on Landsat 8 and 9, providing overview of the satellites (Summary), notable academic papers that have utilised data from these satellites (Application) and individual reflection.

```{r, echo = FALSE, out.width='40%'}
xaringanExtra::embed_xaringan(
  url = "https://asdfgukyu.github.io/rm_pres/Portfolio_starter.html#1",
  ratio = "16:10")
```
